settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.title: Avoid Allergic Reactions
settings.text: Table & Twine’s allergy-friendly meal kits make dinnertime enjoyable – not stressful. Since our chefs thoughtfully develop these recipes, you don’t need to worry about uncomfortable symptoms like coughing or digestive upset.

settings.title: Eliminate Time-Consuming Label Examination
settings.text: Whether you have a serious nut allergy or a mild gluten sensitivity, you likely spend loads of time reading nutrition labels. Fortunately, when you order an allergy-friendly meal kit from Table & Twine, you can simply untwine and dine.

settings.title: Everyone Can Eat at the Same Time
settings.text: All Table & Twine meals – allergy-friendly or not – can be prepared in 15 minutes or less. That means even if you order a different dish from your wife and kids, you can all start eating in just 15 minutes.

settings.section_heading: Why Choose an Allergy-Friendly Meal Kit in Charlotte?
settings.text: Our talented chefs have developed a variety of allergy-friendly meals that are delicious and convenient. Since these dishes are easy to prepare and come in single-serving portions, you can enjoy a meal with the rest of your family. Other benefits of allergy-friendly meal kits include:

A Stress-Free Gathering: Let’s face it: Entertaining can be stressful. Between planning, shopping, and chopping, you have little energy to actually enjoy your own event. But when you opt for a Labor Day meal kit in Charleston, we do all the work for you. So, you can spend more time partying and less time worrying.

Classic Flavors With a Twist: At Table & Twine, our chefs are passionate about elevating the flavors you know and love with bold spices, farm-fresh produce, and locally-sourced proteins. The result? A backyard banquet that puts the average barbecue to shame.

Fewer Dishes & Less Cleanup: As Charleston catering professionals, we know the exhausting task of scrubbing pots and pans all too well. With hopes of saving you some time, we ship many of our dishes in oven-ready packaging. That way, you can spend your Labor Day splashing around in the pool – not the kitchen sink.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: Why Choose a Labor Day Meal Kit?
settings.text2: Perhaps you love to prepare intricate, multi-course dinners. Or, maybe you’re more of a microwaving maven. No matter where you fall, Table & Twine will help you whip up a flavorful Labor Day meal in no time. Other benefits of ordering our holiday meal kits include:

settings.title: How much time is required to prepare the food in my Labor Day meal kit?
settings.text: Preparing your Labor Day meal should take about one hour. You can find the easy-to-follow heating instructions on the packaging of every dish.

settings.title: How far in advance do I need to order my Labor Day meal kit?
settings.text: To receive your meal kit for Labor Day, please place an order by August 29th.

settings.title: Can I customize my Labor Day meal kit?
settings.text: Since our chefs curate every meal to have a pleasing balance of flavors, Table & Twine meal kits cannot be customized.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
